"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556bbefb6368724573810f00#post_556bbefb6368724573810f00
This might sound funny but I am very happy to hear people like this game.

I really do. This game deserves A LOT more love but its just too obscure.

Especially for a Capcom title. So the game got berried under all the really popular titles like Devil May Cry and Resident Evil. 

I just wish the game would get like an HD release or even a Digital release because it is very expensive. 

Hell I even love the game down to the Shitty voice acting.
